Name: Ifrit
Desc:
Temporarily summons Ifrit of Fire Elementals. Also, permanently increases Mastery. Ifrit's attacks do not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status.
Lv. 30 Effect: Can learn the 5th advancement Skill, Ifrit's Fiery Anger.

Desc.Old:
Temporarily summons Ifrit of Fire Elementals. Ifrit attacks multiple enemies. Learning the Ifrit skill permanently increases Mastery. Ifrit's attack does not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status.
Lv. 30 Effect: Can learn the 5th Job Skill, 'Ifrit's Fiery Anger'
Desc.New:
Temporarily summons Ifrit of Fire Elementals. Also, permanently increases Mastery. Ifrit's attacks do not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status.
Lv. 30 Effect: Can learn the 5th advancement Skill, Ifrit's Fiery Anger.

H.Old:
MP Cost: 120. Summons Ifrit for 260 sec.
Ifrit attacks up to 3 enemies at 150% Damage 3 times, inflicting 140% DoT damage on them every 1 sec. for a total of 2 sec.
[Passive Effects: Permanently boosts Mastery increase rate to +70%]
